function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High-risk patients identification","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement targeted screening and quarantine measures for high-risk individuals","Technologies":"Health monitoring wearable devices, AI-driven risk assessment algorithms","People":"Elderly, immunocompromised, and other high-risk individuals","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, public health authorities"},{"Description":"COVID-19 hotspot mapping","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus in localized areas","Mitigation":"Deploy real-time surveillance and targeted interventions in hotspot areas","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, Big data analytics, IoT sensor networks","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in hotspot regions","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate real-time case surveillance","Impact":"Delayed response to outbreaks and difficulty in tracking the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Enhance real-time data collection and reporting systems for rapid response","Technologies":"Cloud-based surveillance platforms, IoT-enabled case reporting, AI-driven predictive modeling","People":"General population, healthcare professionals, public health authorities","Owner":"Health agencies, government institutions"}]}
